title: Tasty Baked Chicken Cream Cheese Dip Recipe
content:
Delicious chicken cream cheese dip which tastes amazing for parties or get-togethers. This is not only easy to make but taste amazing.

This is a great party recipe. You can make a big batch of it and enjoy it as a dip for parties.

 

Chicken Cream Cheese Dip Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 15 mins

Total time: 25 mins

 

Recipe type: Appetizer

Cuisine: American

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Leftover Cooked Chicken - 1 cup shredded

Cream Cheese - ½ cup

Mozzarella Cheese - 1 cup

Mayonnaise - 3 tablespoon

Black pepper - ½ teaspoon

Relish - 1 tablespoon

Spring Onion - 4 tablespoons chopped finely

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients together, spoon into a baking dish and smoothen the top.

Bake in a 200 degree C. preheated oven for 15 to 20 mins.

Serve it with chips or pita bread.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
